author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request met all of the guidelines for auto-merging and is scheduled to be merged when the mandatory waiting period has elapsed.

---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->
Seems like this could use a better name, it's not very specific (huehue).

What do you specifically suggest? :)

This creates specific methods for the subtypes of a type (fix ambiguity error!). The name is aligned with `@specific` macro. 

P.S: I was actually thinking of submitting to Julia Base itself because it solves an ambiguity error that many people may run into.
Isn't this a subset of what https://github.com/peterahrens/Hyperspecialize.jl provides?
I am going to rename the package to do more general type transformation. So please close this PR.
Should be closed in favor of https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/8941
